org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors

Class Vectors

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.Vectors

  • public final class Vectors
extends java.lang.Object

    Utility methods for interacting with vectors.

    • Method Detail

      • fromScoredIds

        public static MutableSparseVector fromScoredIds(java.util.List<ScoredId> scores)

      • fromArray

        public static MutableSparseVector fromArray(IdIndexMapping map,
                            double[] values)

        Create a mutable sparse vector from an array and index mapping.

        Parameters:
        map - The index mapping specifying the keys.
        values - The array of values.
        Returns:
        A sparse vector mapping the IDs in map to the values in values.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if values not the same size as map.

      • intersect

        public static java.lang.Iterable<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.ImmutablePair<VectorEntry,VectorEntry>> intersect(SparseVector v1,
                                                                                                  SparseVector v2)

        Iterate over the intersection of two vectors - they keys they have in common.

        Parameters:
        v1 - The first vector.
        v2 - The second vector.
        Returns:
        An iterator over the common pairs. This iterator will never contain null entries.

      • fastIntersect

        public static java.lang.Iterable<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<VectorEntry,VectorEntry>> fastIntersect(SparseVector v1,
                                                                                             SparseVector v2)

        Iterate over the intersection of two vectors without the overhead of object creation.

        Parameters:
        v1 - The first vector.
        v2 - The second vector.
        Returns:
        A fast iterator over the common keys of the two vectors.
        See Also:
        intersect(SparseVector, SparseVector)
